title: Identify
text: Identify what you are solving for.
speech: Identify what you are solving for.
pacedSpeech: Identify what you are solving for.

title: What Are You Solving For
text: You are solving for the speed of Wayne.
speech: You are solving for the speed of Wayne.
pacedSpeech: You are solving for the speed of Wayne.

title: Make a Variable
text: Create a variable to represent the Wayne's speed. Let's call the Wayne's speed $$x$$. Since Dennis's speed is $$7$$ mph faster than the Wayne's speed, Dennis's speed would be $$x+7$$.
speech: Create a variable to represent the Wayne's speed. Let's call the Wayne's speed , x . Since Dennis's speed is  7  mph faster than the Wayne's speed, Dennis's speed would be  x, plus 7 .
pacedSpeech: Create a variable to represent the Wayne's speed. Let's call the Wayne's speed  , x
mph faster than the Wayne's speed, Dennis's speed would be   x, plus 7

title: Translate to Equation
text: Translate the situation into an equation using variable you named. Remeber that the distances two bikers traveled are the same, and the distance equals $$speed time$$.
speech: Translate the situation into an equation using variable you named. Remeber that the distances two bikers traveled are the same, and the distance equals  speedtime .
pacedSpeech: Translate the situation into an equation using variable you named. Remeber that the distances two bikers traveled are the same, and the distance equals   speedtime

title: The Equation
text: Multiply the speed of the bikers by the time to get $$\operatorname{1.5}\left(x+7\right)=2x$$.
speech: Multiply the speed of the bikers by the time to get  1.5 of, parentheses x plus 7,  is equal to 2 x .
pacedSpeech: Multiply the speed of the bikers by the time to get   1.5 of,  x plus 7,  is equal to 2 x

title: Solving the Equation
text: After solving the equation, what do you get for $$x$$?

subHints.title: Solving the Equation
subHints.text: To solve the equation $$\operatorname{1.5}\left(x+7\right)=2x.$$, we follow these steps: 1.5x+10.5=2x-->0.5x=10.5-->x=21.

speech: After solving the equation, what do you get for  x ?
